price: Munarwane mu nzira ya Allah, kandi mumenye ko Allah ari Uwumva bihebuje, Umumenyi uhebuje.
arabic: وَقَٰتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waqātilū fī sabīli al-lahi wa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha samīʿun ʿalīmun
